title: The Calm Before the Xbox Storm - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.15.24
description:
Pre-Order Final Fantasy VII Rebirth here! https://bit.ly/FF7R_KindaFunny

Go to http://factormeals.com/kindafunny50 and use code kindafunny50 to get 50% off

Blessing and Tim talk about every Xbox being a screen, more Nintendo Direct rumors, and more Embracer news.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:37 - Housekeeping
 - We’re reacting to the special edition of the Xbox podcast later today at noon and recording Xcast right after. Tune in right here on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and Twitch to watchalong.
 - A new KF Podcast is up titled “Would you throw a football at a 2 Year Old”. Youtube.com/KindaFunny
 - The Hulk Hogan Vs The Rock episode of WWE Wrestlemania in Review is up on Youtube.com/KindaFunny
 - CD PROJEKT RED will be hosting a special panel during PAX East 2024 titled "Code, Sweat, and Cheers: How we Made Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty" with our very own Blessing Adeoye Jr. moderating the discussion! If you are at PAX East, come hang out  March 23rd, 2024, at 3:30 PM local time, in the Main Theatre of the Boston Convention & Exhibition Center, but even if you aren't, you can watch at home on the official PAX East Twitch channel!
 - Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Karl Jacobs, Streaking Ain't Easy, Delaney Twining
         -   The Roper Report   -
00:07:37 - Ahead of its business update, Microsoft reportedly told staff ‘every screen is an Xbox’ - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:15:15 - What’s up with this February Direct?
00:32:45 - Sony could release a new Astro Bot game this year, it’s claimed - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:43:56 - Embracer says it's looking out for shareholders after cutting almost 1,400 jobs - Chris Kerr @ Game Developer
00:48:17 - Avatar: The Last Airbender competitive multiplayer fighting game announced - Sal Romano @ Gematsu
00:54:25 - Wee News!
00:58:14 - SuperChats
01:04:37 - You‘re Wrong
01:10:00 - X-Men Trailer Reacts
